description: This file defines React components for a Dialog UI element, wrapping Radix UI primitives and providing styled components such as overlay, content, header, footer, title, and description, with support for forwarding refs and handling dialog open/close states.

methods.name: DialogOverlay
methods.description: A styled overlay component that covers the screen when the dialog is open, supporting animated transitions.

methods.name: DialogContent
methods.description: A styled content container for the dialog, including header, body, and close button, with animation and positioning logic.

methods.name: DialogHeader
methods.description: A flexible container for dialog header content, supports custom styling.

methods.name: DialogFooter
methods.description: A container for dialog footer actions, supporting layout adjustments.

methods.name: DialogTitle
methods.description: A styled title component for the dialog, supports forwarding refs.

methods.name: DialogDescription
methods.description: A styled description component providing additional info within the dialog.
